titleInfo.title: Front View, Statue of Rameses II, Temple of Amen

mods.abstract: Front view of a statue of Rameses II (New Kingdom - Dynasty XIX), nemes crown pharaoh identified by cartouche on pedestal stares placidly ahead with fists balled at his side, wearing false beard and kilt between incised columns; untitled print, "536" in pencil on back of print.

titleInfo.title: Nineteenth and Early Twentieth Century Images of Egypt

location.physicalLocation: Frank H. McClung Museum of Natural History and Culture

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Frank H. McClung Museum of Natural History and Culture
